snippet: Zlatan Ibrahimovic will miss the second leg of Paris St.-Germain’s Champions League quarterfinal against Chelsea on Tuesday because of a thigh muscle tear.
abstract: Zlatan Ibrahimovic will miss the second leg of Paris St-Germain’s Champions League quarterfinal against Chelsea because of a thigh muscle tear; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Zlatan Ibrahimovic will miss the second leg of Paris St.-Germain’s Champions League quarterfinal against Chelsea on Tuesday because of a thigh muscle tear.
